channel.title: Sign out :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Add a sign-out solution Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 420 Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Page type: Navigation Content type: Autogenerated Index An autogenerated index is an automatically generated list of links to topics immediately beneath it based purely on the site’s structure, or with some level of filtering. A blind list of summaries and links to child docs.

item.title: Sign a user out with auth.js
item.description: Sign a user out wiht auth.js Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 244 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/auth-js-redirect/main/#add-a-sign-out-function Links to original docs: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/auth-js-redirect/main/#add-a-sign-out-function Page type: Task Content type: How-to with code A “How-to with code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that involves writing code.

item.title: Create your own sign-out form
item.description: Create your own sign-out form Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 895 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Update title Technically, this sign out could go under Build > Add a sign-out solution but the desire was to keep as much as possible all the SDK docs in one space.

item.title: Sign a user out from all OIDC SSO apps

item.title: Add Universal Logout to your app
item.description: Add Universal Logout to your app Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 421 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: This as-new doc needs to guide a user through an implementation of UL, including code and explanation of flow. The HTTP Response codes should not be included, and those looking for an overview of UL should be directed to Learn > SLO and UL

item.title: Delete all stay signed-in sessions
